product_name: GoPro Flat and Curved Adhesive Mounts
long_description: These GoPro flat and curved adhesive mounts feature sticky 3M backing that clings tenaciously to smooth surfaces, yet they are easy to remove when heat is applied, such as with a hair dryer.
short_description: These GoPro flat and curved adhesive mounts feature sticky 3M backing that clings tenaciously to smooth surfaces, yet they are easy to remove when heat is applied, such as with a hair dryer.
